description: Number of "polyspheres", or "connected animals" formed from n rhombic dodecahedra (or edge-connected cubes) in the f.c.c. lattice, allowing translation and rotations of the lattice, reflections and 180 deg. rotations about a 3-fold symmetry axis of the lattice.
links: Index entries for sequences related to f.c.c. lattice
S. T. Coffin, Puzzling World of Polyhedral Dissections, Oxford Univ. Press, 1991.
author: Achim Flammenkamp (achim(AT)uni-bielefeld.de), Torsten Sillke (TORSTEN.SILLKE(AT)LHSYSTEMS.COM).
extensions: a(9) and a(10) from Achim Flammenkamp (achim(AT)uni-bielefeld.de) Feb 15 1999.
